mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password_hash, role, created_at, updated_at, school, phone, email, bio, avatar_url, gender, birthday FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (username, password_hash, role, created_at, updated_at, school, phone, email, bio, avatar_url, gender, birthday) VALUES (#{username}, #{passwordHash}, #{role}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt}, #{school}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{bio}, #{avatarUrl}, #{gender}, #{birthday})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET password_hash = #{passwordHash}, role = #{role}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
